text: Central Reception and Assignment Facility (CRAF) is an intake and central processing facility for the New Jersey prison system, located in Trenton, New Jersey. It was opened in 1997, and has beds for 562 inmates at mixed security levels. ==References== Category:Prisons in New Jersey Category:Buildings and structures in Mercer County, New Jersey Category:Trenton, New Jersey Category:1997 establishments in New Jersey
title: Central Reception and Assignment Facility
